name: Ninja Attack
description:
You play as a ninja fending off waves of various types of ghosts, each getting increasingly difficult from the last.

How many waves can you last before the ghost onslaught overwhelms you.

Coming Soon

  • Classic mode: 40 waves, survive as long as you can without dying. Leave before you die to collect your rewards or battle on for a chance at more or to lose it all. Completing classic mode unlocks endless mode
  • Endless mode: Seperate from the classic mode, endless mode lasts beyond the standard 40 waves of classic mode and can get you greater rewards for lasting past the standard 40 waves.
  • Skills: Using the rewards you get from classic and endless mode you can upgrade certain skills to imrpove your chances at surviving.
  • Bosses: Every 10 waves you will have to face a boss ghost who will be more challenging than normal, once defeated a greater reward will be given and you'll advance to the tier of ghost
